actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds.
Mr. Anderson asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
Committee on Public Works + Transportation discharged.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the appreciation of Congress for the contributions of the Friends of the National Arboretum in providing for the preservation and public display of 22 of the original columns of the east Front Portico of the United States Capitol Building.

summary.text: Expresses the appreciation of the Congress for contributions of Friends of the National Arboretum in providing for preservation and public display of 22 original sandstone Corinthian columns of the U.S. Capitol.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the appreciation of Congress for the contributions of the Friends of the National Arboretum in providing for the preservation and public display of 22 of the original columns of the east Front Portico of the United States Capitol Building.
